  
BLOCK ELEMENTS TEST

FROM XML:
<xslTutorial>
<APPLET>this</APPLET><APPLET>rocks</APPLET>
<APPLET>this</APPLET>
<APPLET>rocks</APPLET>
<APPLET>this</APPLET>
<APPLET>rocks</APPLET>
<APPLET>this</APPLET>
<APPLET>rocks</APPLET>
<SPAN>this</SPAN><APPLET>rocks</APPLET>
<SPAN>this</SPAN>
<APPLET>rocks</APPLET>
</xslTutorial>
